channel.title: Help making admin/mod/owner
channel.description:
Ok, I have read the tuts on making accounts admin/owner/mod and whatnot I have followed the exact steps changing the freeslot to the account name and whatnot but....it still doesn't show the account as a admin/owner/mod.I realize that one of them will not show to you but to others and I have added the code to fix that problem also but....still no crowns and on the start screen it tells me the owners and mods ect. are the same as when I originally downloaded testscape.
Any help please?

item.title: Help making admin/mod/owner
item.dc:creator: @taytayt123 taytayt123
item.description:
@taytayt123 wrote:

Ok, I have read the tuts on making accounts admin/owner/mod and whatnot I have followed the exact steps changing the freeslot to the account name and whatnot but…it still doesn’t show the account as a admin/owner/mod.I realize that one of them will not show to you but to others and I have added the code to fix that problem also but…still no crowns and on the start screen it tells me the owners and mods ect. are the same as when I originally downloaded testscape.

Any help please?
